entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued May 13 at 2:33PM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...High Water Levels Likely Into Next Week... Warm temperatures across the eastern Interior, combined with a much above normal snowpack over higher elevations, is causing a significant increase in snowmelt.
